channel.title: CVE Feed for EZB Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EZB Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2840|2024-08-05T14:09:16.826Z -- ezb%20systems -- ultraiso
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the ISO parsing functionality of EZB Systems UltraISO 9.6.6.3300. A specially crafted .ISO file can cause a vulnerability resulting in potential code execution. An attacker can provide a specific .ISO file to trigger this vulnerability.
